content.question: The political climate during McCarthy’s era had the most in common with which of the following?

choices.label: The efforts to limit immigrants’ political and economic power in the 1840s and 1850s
The attacks on radicals and immigrants following the First World War
The isolationism in United States foreign policy during the 1930s
The decline in public confidence and trust in government in the 1970s

content.answer: The attacks on radicals and immigrants following the First World War

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
